page.title: 01Todwick Village
page.content: {Todwick}is a village in{South {Yorkshire}11 miles east of{Sheffield. Shops include a super market, post office,fish and chip shop,and a hairdressers. There is a childrens park and a recreation ground. Most of the buildings have been built since 1960 but there are a few older houses. There are several farms in the surrounding countryside and in the small hamlet of{Hardwick}there is a garden nursery and a saddlery. North of Todwick is{Todwick Grange Special School. Most of the land west of Todwick and north of the{A57 is agricultural. Todwick is a quiet place even though the{M1 motorway}is only about a mile to the west.
